definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Glancing quickly at me, she said, ” Take the shampoo and wash your hair.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速瞟了我一眼，说，“拿洗发精洗洗你的头发。

sentences.english: I'm sorry. Here are the shampoo and bath gel.
sentences.chinese: 真抱歉，这些是洗发精和沐浴乳。

sentences.english: The evaluation methods for functions of shampoo and bath lotions in Japan were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了日本洗发精和沐浴露的功能性评价方法。

sentences.english: A：I think we need to buy shampoo．
This kind of shampoo is used to remove the residue that builds up on hair.
sentences.chinese: 这种洗发精是用来清除累积在头发上的化学残余物。

sentences.english: I'm short of shampoo and bath gel.
sentences.chinese: 洗发精和沐浴乳都不够。

sentences.english: You should switch shampoos each time you do your hair.
sentences.chinese: 你每次应该转变洗发精，你做你的头发。

sentences.english: The pumpkin seed oil and tea tree shampoo you ordered have arrived.
sentences.chinese: 您订购的南瓜子油和茶树洗发精已经到货了。

sentences.english: We use zinc in shampoo and sunblock products.
sentences.chinese: 我们的洗发精和防晒霜也包含锌的成份。

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了打包我的洗发精。

sentences.english: In an attempt to buy fewer items with plastic packaging, Haegele recently went three months without using any shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少塑料的使用，何葛莱三个月没用洗发精。

sentences.english: Application of the anti-danDruff shampoo will make your hair elegant and attractive.
sentences.chinese: 去头屑洗发精，让您的秀发飘逸动人。
